thread.title: Rob Gronkowski Hyping The Hell Out Of Mojo Rawley While Training For Wrestlemania Is #BroGoals
thread.title_full: Rob Gronkowski Hyping The Hell Out Of Mojo Rawley While Training For Wrestlemania Is #BroGoals

author: Brandon Wenerd
title: Rob Gronkowski Hyping The Hell Out Of Mojo Rawley While Training For Wrestlemania Is #BroGoals
text:
If you follow Maryland’s own Dean Muhtadi a.k.a. Mojo Rawley on Instagram, you know that he and Rob Gronkowski are pretty close boys. Last night Gronk crashed WWE Smackdown in Connecticut to support his bro Mojo. Now today he’s hyping him in the gym before next Sunday’s huge event in the Battle Royal.
Their Bromance is truly #brogoals. Get you a Bro like Gronk, Bros. Every Bro needs a Bro like Gronk in their lives.
Sure he’s injured and still has years on his contract with the Patriots, but pretty sure that Gronk is gonna come out in a light capacity for his WWE debut at Wrestlemania. It’s what he’s wanted for years .
